SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inventory i, film f
i.film_id=f.film_id
AND f.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')

SELECT i.inventory_id inventoryId, i.store_id storeId, f.title title, case when inventory_held_by_customer (i.inventory_id) IS NOT null then '대여중' ELSE '재고있음' END 'stockStatus', inventory_held_by_customer (i.inventory_id) AS customerId FROM inventory i, film f
i.film_id=f.film_id
AND f.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT inventory_in_stock(#{inventoryId}) AS state, i.inventory_id inventoryId, f.title title, f.rating rating, f.rental_rate rentalRate, f.rental_duration rentalDuration FROM inventory i INNER JOIN film f ON i.film_id=f.film_id WHERE i.inventory_id= #{inventoryId}
